### Trend Analysis

The trend analysis tool is designed to allow for GMs to take a deep dive into the data and proivede the information needed to support the claim of greatest fantasy manager. Need to know who you dominate? Your have arrived at the right spot. The table below shows the selected GM's record versus other GMs in the league. The chart shows how much better or worse a GM performs in comparison to thier overall historical average. For example, Milk Man has a 7.56 +/- against Black Mass, inidcating that when Milk Man plays Black Mass he scored 7.56 more points than his overall points scored average.
